title: What font is this?
content:
I've been looking everywhere, including my 10,988 fonts folder and still can't find this exact one. Please help! Thank you in advance. :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-07-03 at 1.50.50 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019070711/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-03%20at%201.50.50%20PM.png) | 13.64 KB |
author: upenzi

comments.content:
Over 10,000 fonts, that must have cost a fortune!

It’s Neutraface.

How can you afford so many fonts - wow!

hhp

Most of the time, I include font purchases in my design fees for clients. So I have a lot that were purchased because of that. I've officially been a designer since 2006, purchasing fonts for personal projects since as early as 2002. :)
That’s cool, sounds like the antithesis of the Vignelli typeface philosophy.

Ah! Sorry.  
A girl can't have enough fonts.

hhp

With that many fonts at your fingertips, you're bound to go "I know have this font ... if I only knew its name!" about every day. You might want to look at Fivos Vilanakis' [Find My Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019070711/http:/www.findmyfont.com/) utility. Try the free test version.

Type ID Board  
I am new at this and may have posted this in the wrong place.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019070711im_/http:/typophile.com/files/What%20Font%20is%20This_3994.jpg)

Gary3326, please start new thread for your ID request.  
Don
How do I delete this one please.
